folder: Unionport Road & Odell Street, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)

1400 and 1418 Unionport Road (left), east side, at its junction with Odell Street, showing two old frame houses. The view is northward.

July 9, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)

A view of the two houses ten years later, as seen from Olmstead Avenue, at Benedict Avenue.

April 10, 1938.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)

An exclusive view of No. 1400 Unionport Road.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Unionport Road & Odell Street, Bronx, NY
text:
Unionport Road, n. fr. Odell St., showing in the background, the new housing development of the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company, the Park-chester Houses.

Sept. 4, 1939
P. L. Sperr, photographer
